data.eml:eml: The Braconinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) of Turkey, with new locality records and descriptions of two new species of Bracon Fabricius, 1804

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Beyarslan, Ahmet, Erdoğan, Özlem Çetin (2012): The Braconinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) of Turkey, with new locality records and descriptions of two new species of Bracon Fabricius, 1804. Zootaxa 3343: 45-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281424
